title: Is Crypto-AI Really a Match Made in Heaven?
description: There’s lots of talk these days about how blockchains can make AI safe for human consumption. But is the idea, widely touted in the crypto community, workable in practice? Jeff Wilser takes a critical look.

title: Tether Resumes USDT Loans, Insists It Maintains Excess Reserves
description: Stablecoin issuer Tether has resumed lending USDT to clients, walking back a prior commitment to discontinue the practice.

title: U.S. Treasury yields surge to multi-year highs
description:
Treasury bills, commonly referred to as T-bills, are short-term securities issued by the U.S. government. They are essentially IOUs, with the government promising to pay back the face value of the bill upon its maturity. The yield on a Treasury bill represents the return an investor will receive by holding the bill until maturity. Yields […]

The post U.S. Treasury yields surge to multi-year highs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: FCA issues warning to unregistered crypto firms on new promotions regime
description: The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has warned unregistered crypto firms sternly, highlighting their apparent lack of engagement with the impending financial promotions regime. title: BTC, ARK, & WLD Technicals Give Mixed Signals About What Is Next
description:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ark (ARK), and Worldcoin (WLD) made it onto CoinMarketCap’s trending list over the past 24-hours, but all for different reasons.
